alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 5:41PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with wind gusts to 50 mph, brief rainfall, occasional lightning and isolated small hail will impact portions of eastern Fergus and southern Blaine Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 538 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms across eastern Fergus and southern Blaine counties, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winifred, Grass Range, Hays, Roy, Fergus, Suffolk, Fred Robinson Bridge, Valentine, Lodge Pole and Christina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
